name: Appsmith
short_description: Low-code internal tools platform for rapid application development.
description: Low-code internal tools platform for rapid application development. Appsmith is a self-hosted application focused on productivity, development, git, devops. It can be deployed on any device via Docker Compose.
usecases: Self-host Appsmith on your home server to low-code internal tools platform for rapid application development without depending on third-party cloud services.
Use Appsmith to manage your productivity workflows privately, keeping all data under your control on local infrastructure.
